name: Screen Dodgers
description:
Screen Dodgers

Dodge bullets and enemies to see how long you can survive in the cage.  Use your lightning fast reflexes to avoid the dangerous enemies summoned by the Screen Bouncer.  The number of Screen Bouncers increases as your score gets higher, causing even more enemies to spawn.  Go for gold in this chaotic arcade platformer.

-Created for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam
